hadith.text: It was narrated that Talq bin 'Ali said:"We went out as a delegation and when we arrived with the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) he accepted our oath of allegiance and we prayed with him. When he had finished the prayer, a man who looked like a Bedouin came to him and said: 'O Messenger of Allah, what do you think about a man who touched his penis during the Salah?'
